PABLO

Pablo is a fish in a small town he delivers mail and does odd jobs one day while out on a delivery to a distant fish Pablo falls down into a super Deep part of the ocean he eventually gets out from this area and discovered that he is somewhere he's never been before and only heard spooky stories of shark City Pablo helps out in shark city and poos himself to be brave and capable and eventually earned the respect of some sharks but then he gets captured by humans and is taken to a sushi restaurant where he is escapes with help from Miley Cyrus she releases him back into the ocean and he returns to his small town and delivers the package Which is to a attractive va seahorse he tells her the story of his amazing journey the end..
